website_summaries.verdict: A great sturdy option if you’re looking for an environmentally-friendly rack, although the bamboo board is more useful as a shelf than a cutting board.
pros: Constructed using eco-friendly production methods to minimize its toxic footprint
Easy to put together and very sturdy, particularly the shelving
cons: Bamboo cutting board discolors easily and is difficult to install correctly without a level

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Very steady
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. This unit was the tallest of the ones I could find online. Cutting board surface is just an inch lower than my counter tops. I can't imaging using something lower. It's perfect. Very steady, very well-made. Bamboo cutting board is also very nice. It is not very thick (as others have also noted), but now that I think about it, all bamboo cutting boards are thinner than hardwood boards. It's nice that it is removable for cleaning or use elsewhere. If it were thicker it would be terribly heavy. It went together VERY easily. Just pay attention to the directions and it's a snap. It does go much faster with 2 people. I REALLY like it.
customer_reviews.author: Curiosity

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long to put together and the fact that everything is adjustable makes it even that more amazing. My apartment's floors are slanted and the adjustable feet keep it stable. The bamboo cutting board was a little wobbly but I just put some paper towel under it and it fixed the problem. I needed more counter space in my small apartment and this helps store my cooking utensils and spices easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Xian

customer_reviews.title: Useful rack.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble rack. I use the bottom 2 shelves for storage of the items that I use on a regular basis rather than going into 3 or 4 cabinets digging for them all the time. I'm tall, so I purchased castor wheels separately that brought the rack to the right height for me for using the block surface. It was okay at the standard height. Taller than my kitchen counters. But, the wheels put it at an even more comfortable height. I bought it for that reason and, the extra storage. Since I don't use my garbage disposal, I wanted something I could set my garbage can beside and toss away the strawberry pits etc...
customer_reviews.author: YTM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rack!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a little too big for my small kitchen but it fits perfect! It took me a little over an hour to put together. Very easy directions. It stores my canisters for baking and I bought some canvas draws to store pots and pans. Very Sturdy and the cutting board is great. I would recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley McInerney

customer_reviews.title: will update when I have a chance to go pick item up
customer_reviews.text: Was "delivered" over a week ago, was hoping to have an extra surface in my kitchen for prepping food for the Holidays. I probably won't have a chance to get a vehicle to go pick it up until after the holidays...will keep you posted. I guess I will have to stop ordering stuff that is delivered by UPS. USPS manages to get things delivered.
customer_reviews.author: jarelyn

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I just got this setup and I love it already. Very sturdy even after putting all my cast iron and carbon steel pans on it. Looks great as well! cant wait to keep adding stuff to this to free up my counter space. Only con i can really think of is the instructions SUCK so good luck with that. luckily its not too hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Clint L

customer_reviews.title: This has been one of the best buys for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best buys for our kitchen. It fit perfectly into a recessed section of the wall. The cutting board has held up fairly well. You should keep up on oiling it, as I have started to develop a crack in the bottom side from neglecting that duty. The trough on the board is a great help for keeping the area clean. I also bought little plastic squares to put on the top rack so smaller bottles of spice would sit normally. Otherwise they will sit on the wire and fall over constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Yozsi Bunje

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily, quality just ok
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the wood top shows water stains immediately. The wood turns white and is discolored from the get go, only getting worse over time. if you need it to be perfect, look elsewhere or seal it yourself. Somewhat disappointing for the cost and very average quality (almost level, snap on plastic parts, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, sturdy, multi functional racks
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my kitchen to organize my pans, tea and coffe bar, snack food and plastic ware storage. Easy to assemble, narrow profile, holds a ton of items while still looking neat and tidy. The bamboo shelves will stain if they become wet so they need to be conditioned with special cutting board oil (which I had for my other wooden ware). They are steady and do not wobble once you adjust the bottom plastic pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came really fast and I love the extra storage and work space it gives me ...
customer_reviews.text: It came really fast and I love the extra storage and work space it gives me in the kitchen! Also, the work space board can be lifted off to clean and is the same height as my kitchen counter so that makes things easy. I did put something hot on the bamboo surface and it turned that area whiter/lighter than the rest. I really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: ragosvc

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, but the cutting surface isn't finished
customer_reviews.text: There were two problems with this that prevented it from getting 5 stars. First, the cutting board is not finished and has a very rough surface. I am now looking for a food safe finish to apply to it. Second, there are no screws, bolts, pins, etc everything is weight mounted with rubber stoppers. While this is easy to install, I would have preferred bolts, pins or screws. I will say that it is actually quite sturdy all things considered. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this was going to be flimsy when I got it but it was quite the opposite. This was really easy to put together, it does not wobble and is stable, and it holds big, heavy items really well! The cutting board is really nice looking, too. I actually don't want to use it so it keeps it's look, but I may end up putting a piece of glass over the top and just use it completely as more counter space. Either way, this is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a castle what I expected and I love it! I use the lower shelves to store kitchen appliances (stand mixer, ice cream maker, etc) and the main shelf has my electric kettle, nutribullet and coffee maker. I keep tea and stuff on the top and hang mugs from the hooks it's a really cute station and it's very sturdy. Assembly took about 15 minutes by myself
customer_reviews.author: BeccaGee

customer_reviews.title: Great storage option for those who have limited space
customer_reviews.text: This rack has helped up extend our tiny kitchen and provides badly needed additional storage. I have zero complaints and would recommend this product heartily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great, very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, very easy to setup, and great for small places. I am going to make the best of organizing it with canisters on the top. Anyone else get a cutting board that was warped beyond repair? Its a significant half inch on my unit. This is the only issue. The item was well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I really feel disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The unit was not properly packaged some parts broken as well as bamboo cutting board is too flimsy and thin . I really hope that the manufacturer would improve the quality of the cutting board since that is the part that takes the most pressure from a baker who may Knead dough on the wooden piece . I really feel disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: The bakers rack is amazing. My girlfriend and I are fairly short (5ft 4 & 5ft 6) , the cutting board is a perfect height for chopping and cooking in the kitchen. We live in a small apartment and this freed up soooo much space, the lower shelves are great, heavy duty. The assembly is a little weird, easy to figure out but trust me its sturdy even though it might not seem like it will be. The hooks are prefect for holding utensils or pots and pans, and the upper rack is perfect for spices and other things, not too small but not too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! Nice and sturdy in our small kitchen and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Nice and sturdy in our small kitchen and allows for much more storage and counter space. We bought liners for the shelves though so that items would sit better and not fall through.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Mucci

customer_reviews.title: This was a brilliant addition to my tiny kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This was a brilliant addition to my tiny kitchen. The adjustable shelves are perfect for making tall items fit. The construction is sturdy - we use this daily as a sideboard for food prep and have had no problems. The bamboo top piece is easy to clean - i was worried about food or tea staining it but have had no problem washing it clean. I only wish i would have ordered more S hooks at the time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but I needed to be able to roll ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I needed to be able to roll it out to clean under so I bought casters for it and it worked perfect. Clutter be gone!
customer_reviews.author: His child

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, sturdy, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I researched many different options for a backer's rack in this price range to add extra storage in our small kitchen. I checked out all the usual retailers such as Target, Walmart, Kmart, etc. because I like having a physical store for returns or problems, but I'm SO glad that I picked this one from Amazon instead! Super easy to assemble, looks great, sturdy, has feet levels. Height is perfect. The bamboo part might be a bit thin, but perfectly functional (especially for the price!) and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Provides Solutions for Tight Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my son as a housewarming gift - he just moved into a small apartment with a very small kitchen. He is quite happy with the ease of putting it together, the sturdiness of the shelves and the extra storage space it provides. He is also very tall, over 6'2", and was quite happy with the height of the top shelve - he is able to use the cutting board easily as it is counter height. Excellent solution for tight spaces!
customer_reviews.author: av

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: If you like the look you will love the unit. Packaged well, easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: markp

customer_reviews.title: Many uses!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for kitchen space in small apartment. Now I use it for crafting. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our narrow space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our narrow space. Most of the other islands or stands I saw were much "deeper" -- this one is just the right amount of extra workspace without being too bulky. It is much sturdier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I have no counter top space so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have no counter top space so I really needed a place for the microwave and other things. This is perfect. It was super easy to put together and seems pretty sturdy. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Seavey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the pieces to be a little better made, as the plastic self-adjusters came warped and often did not click into place. Once we got it assembled it was really study and it only took about a half hour, but the quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: We did SO MUCH RESEARCH before deciding on the item. So glad we did. Already planning to order another small one for our kitchen and this same rack for our laundry room. Will be a perfect folding/storage table. It was so easy to set up and we were both surprised about the sturdiness of this item. Seems like there is no way for it to collapse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: EmSav

customer_reviews.title: Great for function and fashion (especially if you have a small kitchen)!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this and the Kitchen Cart to go in my small kitchen in my new apartment. This Baker's Rack more than quadruples the counter space that existed previously, and I love how nice the set looks! The customer service rep from Trinity was very helpful when I contacted them through their website, believing there were missing parts (the parts were actually already attached). Worthwhile purchase(s)!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the shelves came with some boards so stuff like microwaves could sit stable.
customer_reviews.author: Ernsga21

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. The cutting board did not set flush with the rack and wobbled around a lot. The shelving itself is nice, but the board leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: go somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: The metal part of the shelf is nice and stable. Lots of scratches on the poles but you can over look it. BUT the wooden part is horrible. Gouges and discoloration. Paint marks. Horrible. Go somewhere else if you want that part to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a litlle bit insecure about the quality when I ordered it but now that I got it I'm really happy with this purchase.. I highly recommend it, is well made and easy to build
customer_reviews.author: Perla Flores

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and very sturday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as he didn't have any shelf room in his kitchen (he lives in a studio apartment). It was easy to put together and very sturday. Has a lot of shelving to put microwave or anything else you would like. I would buy one again if I needed one!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, and slim profile. I don't have a lot of counter space, so I needed an extension. I was looking for a kitchen island or a rack. I found this rack on Amazon with really good reviews. It is the same height as the counter. The shelves are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime G.

customer_reviews.title: This was super easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and very sturdy. i have my microwave on the top shelf. i love it and it was just what i was wanting. price was reasonable as well
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchens
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and worth every penny. Helps with storage and extra counter space
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing and fits perfectly in the kitchen of my small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and fits perfectly in the kitchen of my small flat. It's a great space saver and give me that added counter space I need.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's not commercial grade wire shelving, but it's sturdy enough for our needs. It was easy to put together with spare black pressure pieces. The bamboo top is actually a bit thinner than a regular bamboo chopping board. it easily flips over to create a smooth work surface. it could use a rub down with mineral or wood oil before using for chopping. i tend to use a cutting board on top of this anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I studied all the racks available before deciding on this one, and it's absolutely perfect in my kitchen. Easy to put together too, I'm very proud that I did it by myself. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Magnus

customer_reviews.title: amazing must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a still of a de al!!!!! Its easy to out together and its amazing for small spaces it is strong and better than regular baker racks and with free shipping that made it all better.its a must have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this baker's rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this baker's rack. I was little concern that the height of the cutting board would be too low but it is just the perfect height. I'm 5'9" and the cutting board is weist height for me. It is the perfect size. I absolutely love it. would highly recomend it. Its a beautiful addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: HERNAN JUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. My only concern is the wood isn't treated so it gets water stains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: It feels pretty well built. The wood top gets water stains very easily, so be careful about that. I like the little basket on top for putting fruit to ripen. I hang my bananas from a hook.
customer_reviews.author: RoamingBison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, has the larger metal poles then the look alike here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.E

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a small apartment.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and fits lots of things. It's quite sturdy. We've put all our kitchen appliances in it and it seems to be handling all the weight. Must have for a small kitchen or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha

customer_reviews.title: great price, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for, great price, sturdy, and it looks awesome. And easy to assemble. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product. Wish the back poles were a little longer to raise the top shelf but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Timo

customer_reviews.title: ... and what I was looking for but not something nice and permanent
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and what I was looking for but not something nice and permanent
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want a kitchen cart, just needed more counter space in my kitchen. This freed up a lot of space, and provided more usable space when needed. Was easily assembled and is quite sturdy when put together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very well made product
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking easy to put together well made exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: K. Oshea

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack it fits perfectly in the space holds everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: Christine D Avanzo

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf!! Truly fantastic and fits perfects in my kitchen. Great storage! And designed well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Seaman

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Came in just as pictured. I think my only ding would be against the bamboo board. I spilled water on it one time and it has stained. I think I will try to get that off with some sandpaper....oh well! It's sturdy and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not as wide as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I was looking for. Easy to assemble - no tools needed!. One of the connector pieces had a small crack in it, but did not affect assembly or how it looks in any way shape or form. Great product. Fast delivery. Definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Davec007

customer_reviews.title: REALLY great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second baker's rack like this I've ordered in my life. I was happy with the first one, even happier with this one. It took me all of ten minutes to set up and I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my outdoor kitchen and it's great. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product fits perfect in my space but the I'm using the top ...
customer_reviews.text: The product fits perfect in my space but the I'm using the top shelf for spices and they constantly fall over. Also the bamboo piece came cracked on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Watkins

customer_reviews.title: This shelf was very easy to put together and works great
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was very easy to put together and works great. This really helps give lots of open space for organizing my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lim

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was more distance between very top and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more distance between very top and top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Steph S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to assemble! Very sturdy. Great for adding extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Reaux

customer_reviews.title: ... able to get the cutting board level (despite my best efforts rejiggering the racks)
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but have not been able to get the cutting board level (despite my best efforts rejiggering the racks), which is annoying but I am currently chalking up to human error at this point. Otherwise it is very useful for additional, easy to access kitchen storage.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the baker rack. However, the wood is being stained by water.
customer_reviews.author: FriendLilyNess

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy. We needed extra storage in our small kitchen and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup, stable and very useful. Pans, pots and mixers easily stored for quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Ihab Khoury

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect size for the space I needed it in
customer_reviews.author: Dan L

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: we needed extra storage and counter space in our studio apt. This was perfect, easy to assemble, strong, sturdy. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine R.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The Baker's Rack is exactly as pictured. It was packaged very well and took just a few minutes to assemble. Since it's light weight, it's easily put in place or moved around as needed. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Catleaf

customer_reviews.title: trinity products are the best
customer_reviews.text: I previously had purchades some trinity racks so when i needed the bakers racks i chose trinity over a different brand. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you have a small, narrow kitchen!! Doubled my counter space! Just make sure you oil the bamboo
customer_reviews.author: Brian D OToole

customer_reviews.title: vey happy with this -- it looks good and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: vey happy with this -- it looks good and is very strong. It has made a huge difference in my kitchen. the finish on the bamboo board is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome, i wish i had room for two.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: I love the bamboo board
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I love the bamboo board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any home. Instructions were clear, took about 10 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schell

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: fit in the small space i had and was just enough room for microwave counter top oven to fit on the shelves love it would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great little rack
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well, there is some weird staining going on with the cutting board but I bought some oil that seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. It's just what I ordered! I looked all around for some kind of shelf with no luck and found one right away on Amazon.com! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy ,, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice rack, but the wood shelf is not finished
customer_reviews.text: nice rack, but the wood shelf is not finished. I set a bowl down that had a bit of water on it and a permanent mark was left. Tried to wash it to remove the mark, only made it worse, What kind of cutting board can you not wash?
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish it came with more instructions on how to care for the bamboo top.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Daudlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The support poles were slightly bent but still useable. The bamboo board had a 5-inch long crack in it. I got it all put together minus the board, and it is sturdy enough. I'm still upset about the board. Really, the packer should be able to check that none of the pieces are damaged.
customer_reviews.author: one_heart_of_glass

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bakers rack
customer_reviews.text: The baker's rack was easy to put together, no thanks to the technical instructions that were poorly written. The rack is very sturdy and wide enough to actually prepare food on it. However, the bamboo board we received was cracked in half. Not sure who we should complain to.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L

customer_reviews.title: Nice bakers cart
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily. Looks good. Fits my space very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Braadshaw

customer_reviews.title: and I liked the hanging bar because I need somewhere to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold my kitchen appliances in my new, smaller apartment. I chose this over other baker's racks because of price, aesthetics, and I liked the hanging bar because I need somewhere to put my cast irons when not in use. I'm still currently moving in so I haven't actually started using this yet but it looks great and feels very sturdy. Putting it together was fairly simple and I was able to do it by myself. I also took a tip from another review and purchased caster wheels so I could easily move the rack around, if needed. (These are the wheels I purchased. They fit perfectly:
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders for a small space
customer_reviews.text: This baker's rack will transform your tiny kitchen. I still don't have room for a microwave but that's OK. Holds plenty of pantry items, pots, pans, random odds and ends, the sky is the limit. Setup was easy and build quality of the shelving is satisfactory. Do watch out for the bamboo top, it stains easily. Maybe treat it with an oil or something to help prevent water marks. Besides that I am completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled, it looks very nice. We recommend that you treat the board with food safe mineral oil which is not provided. It's handy that the board has a trough on one side but flat on the other. We can use a mixer on it (except at high speed which causes it to shake too much). The product had a good number of S-hooks which many similar ones did not. The space between shelves is perfect for those counter hogging but very helpful devices like mixers and blenders etc. The style is very consistent with the rolling cart and pantry shelves. Looks clean and professional.
customer_reviews.author: The Kinsers

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's not commercial quality. But it's a great rack for home use.The top rack displays 6 of my adorable tea pots. The other shelves are plenty of room to store all of those kitchen appliances we "need" but only use once a year. What possessed someone to get me a fondue maker and a microwave "slow cooker"? But I can't get rid of them. So the bottom shelf is their home. And one day, I'll be inspired to use them. The rack looks great and frees up counter and pantry space.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Two years later - prefect! Just buy it! Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rack for two years and it's one of the best investments I've made for my kitchen. My kitchen small with very little counter space. This is a perfect addition for pots and pans storage, among some other kitchen items. It's just as sturdy as the day I bought it. It holds a lot of weight. Just buy it. You won't be disappointed. Five huge stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good for storing lots of kitchen gadgets and pots/pans.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized for the space I put it. I don't much use the cutting board to cut, it's more of a storage spot for a couple small appliances to free up the counter space more permanently. Smooth look and very solid. Took about 10-15 minutes to assemble - it's got the standard clips as most wire racks so if you're familiar with those then it should be a "snap" for ya.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Utilitarian Piece
customer_reviews.text: Good Utilitarian piece. Its not the prettiest piece of furniture we own, but it provides extra counterspace, and storage for our mixing bowls and larger small-kitchen appliances. Assembly was very straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Freed up a lot of room. Good, sturdy unit, accessible, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Z Bop

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bakers rack for some extra storage space for my kitchen. The package arrived fast however UPS must have dropped the box because one of the boxes corner was damaged pretty bad and when I opened the box one of the metal racks corner was bent and the corner of the bamboo board was cracked. I was pretty mad, but called Trinity (the manufacture). Their customer service was the best, they overnighted a replacement rack and bamboo board no questions asked. I couldn't believe how easy it was. The rack isn't industrial strength metal but it isn't cheap either. This is a good quality product from a company that stands behind it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Get It

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I like silver metal shelves in my kitchen. The wood top is nice, but i am sort of scared it will stain... Are there replacements for it?
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rat

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen rack
customer_reviews.text: Great little kitchen rack. I recently moved and my old baker's rack was too big for the space. This fits the space just right. The top rack can be a little clumsy for spices as they can tip over, but not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chenin A.

customer_reviews.title: Less form but more function, especially with a few minor enhancements.
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy adjustable bakers rack. My only two complaints is that the top of the rack is horrible storage for small bottles like spices and the bottom wooden cutting board is pretty thin which makes the rack look cheap. I ended up cutting a thin piece of plywood for my spices to rest upon it without falling over. 1/4" or less should work.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Husted

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a small space in my kitchen and it fits perfectly, adding the extra storage I need. I love that the top is wood and not particle board. It's sturdy but if I have my Kitchen Aid Mixer on high (i.e. kneading bread or mixing big batches of cookies), the rack will shake, so I wouldn't recommend using it this way and move the mixer to the countertop. Love it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: TinaM

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: We just downsized from a larger home to an apartment. This bakers rack helped this transition so much. The bottom rack holds my food dehydrator and wheat grinder. The second shelf from the bottom holds my longer glassware and my large mixing bowls. I was able to hang all my cookware that cannot stack in the cupboards. Thank you for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia J.

customer_reviews.title: Great and hold alot
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack in my kitchen.we did not have enough cabinet space and this was just petfect
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING. It really completed my kitchen in my apartment and is great for all my appliances. I just love love love this rack. However, I very quickly somehow discolored the bamboo cutting board with steam alone. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

product_meta.title: TRINITY TBFZ-1501 EcoStorage Bamboo Baker's Rack, Chrome
product_meta.description: TRINITY's EcoStorage Bamboo Baker's Rack is a great addition to any kitchen or pantry area. The bamboo surface can be either on or off the rack. Shelves are adjustable in 1" increments for your own custom configuration. Also included is a hanging bar with 6 hooks.
feature_bullets: Solid 35"W X 13.5"D X .5"H Bamboo Surface: Complete With Water Trough And Fully Removable For Easy Cleaning And Use
Eco Storage Finish Represents Eco-Friendly Production Where No Toxic Chemicals Are Released Into The Environment During The Production Of This Product
3 Consumer-Grade 36" X 14" Shelves: 250 Lb. Weight Capacity Per Shelf
1 Consumer-Grade 36" X 7" Cantilever Shelf: 25 Lb. Weight Capacity Per Shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year hassle free replacement warranty through trinity.
